# preferredSampleRate

**Instance Property**

The preferred sample rate, in hertz.

## Declaration

```swift
var preferredSampleRate: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property indicates the preferred sample rate set using the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/setPreferredSampleRate(_:)] method.

To determine the actual sample rate, query the [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/sampleRate] property.

## Configuring sample rate

- **sampleRate**: The current audio sample rate, in hertz.
- **setPreferredSampleRate(_:)**: Sets the preferred sample rate for audio input and output.
